Grouped_Utterances: Hi! I’ve been okay. I tried the mindfulness exercises like you suggested. A little bit. I still have moments of doubt, but I’ve been able to catch myself more quickly. Yes, at a recent networking event. I felt out of place and started doubting my abilities again.
I felt proud of myself for pushing through, even if I was anxious.
It was really helpful. I felt a bit more relaxed at night, and I think it improved my sleep.
I feel more prepared now. I think it’ll help me feel less anxious.

I used the evidence approach we talked about. I’d remind myself of the positive feedback I’ve received. I took a few deep breaths and reminded myself that everyone feels nervous sometimes. I tried to focus on enjoying the conversations.

Maybe I could practice some conversation starters or ways to engage with people more confidently. I think I just want to keep building on this confidence and maybe explore some more coping strategies for when I feel overwhelmed. Absolutely! We can delve deeper into coping strategies in our next session. It’s essential to have a toolkit ready for those moments.
